item.title: Evaluation of maturation congeners in beer aged with Brazilian woods
item.description: Beer is the most consumed alcoholic beverage in Brazil. item.description: This study provides qualitative data on sensory compounds present in barrel aged U.S. corn-based whiskies (primarily bourbon) and their unaged counterparts. item.description: Traditionally, beer is obtained from the treatment and processing of three raw materials (barley malt, hops and water).
